FrageText.de: Was wirkt sich ungünstig auf die Länge des Reaktionsweges aus?
FrageText.en: What factors work unfavourably on one's reaction distance?
FrageText.hr: Što djeluje na produljenje puta reagiranja?
FrageText.sl: Kaj vpliva na reakcijsko pot neugodno?
FrageText.tr: Reaksiyon yolunun uzunluğunu olumsuz olarak neler etkiler?

de.Text: Wenn der Lenker zu schwach bremst

en.Text: When the driver is under influence of alcohol
When the driver brakes too weakly
When the driver is not attentive

sl.Text: Če je voznik pod vplivom alkohola
Če voznik ne zavira dovolj močno
